perturbation.original_text:
D.  Any payments which have not been received by PCQ within thirty (30) days of the Invoice date shall be subject to a FINANCE CHARGE of 1.0% per month which is a corresponding ANNUAL

PERCENTAGE RATE of 12% on the outstanding balance.
perturbation.changed_text:
D.  Any payments which have not been received by PCQ within thirty (30) days of the Invoice date may, at PCQ's sole discretion, be subject to a FINANCE CHARGE of up to 1.5% per month. The corresponding ANNUAL

PERCENTAGE RATE will be determined by PCQ on a case-by-case basis for all outstanding balances.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states a fixed finance charge of 1.0% per month for late payments. The modified text introduces ambiguity by saying the finance charge is discretionary and can be 'up to 1.5%', and annual percentage rate will be determined by PCQ. This contradicts the initial fixed rate and creates uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: A.  [***]  The effective date for purposes of this Agreement is the contract date as specified on the signature page of this Agreement.  Neither PCQ nor ABW shall terminate or alter this Agreement except as stated herein.
perturbation.changed_text: A.  [***]  The effective date for purposes of this Agreement is the contract date as specified on the signature page of this Agreement.  Either PCQ or ABW may terminate or alter this Agreement with mutual written consent, except as prohibited herein.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that agreement cannot be altered. The modified version introduces the idea that the agreement can be altered. The modified version now indicates it can with mutual written consent which creates contradiction.

perturbation.original_text: A.   ABW agrees to field all initial customer support requests and assist its clients to the best of its knowledge and ability.  If the support issue is of a complex nature that ABW is unable to solve, ABW may forward the call on to the PCQ technical support staff.
perturbation.changed_text: A.   ABW agrees to field all initial customer support requests and assist its clients to the best of its knowledge and ability.  If the support issue is of a complex nature that ABW is unable to solve, ABW is required to forward the call on to the PCQ technical support staff.
perturbation.explanation: Original text states that if the issue is complex, ABW may forward the call on to the PCQ technical support staff. However the modified version states that ABW is required to forward the call on. It changes from may to must.
